Package org.afree.chart

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChartTheme
    A ChartTheme a class that can apply a style or 'theme' to a chart.
    ChartTouchListener
    The interface that must be implemented by classes that wish to receive ChartTouchEvent notifications from a DemoView.
    Effect3D
    An interface that should be implemented by renderers that use a 3D effect.
    LegendItemSource
    A source of legend items.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AFreeChart
    A chart class implemented using the Android APIs.
    ChartColor
    Class to extend the number of Colors available to the charts.
    ChartFactory
    A collection of utility methods for creating some standard charts with AFreeChart.
    ChartRenderingInfo
    A structure for storing rendering information from one call to the AFreeChart.draw() method.
    ChartTouchEvent
    A touch event for a chart that is displayed in a DemoView.
    ChartUtilities
    A collection of utility methods for AFreeChart.
    EffectMap
    A storage structure that maps Comparable instances with Stroke instances.
    HashUtilities
    Some utility methods for calculating hash codes.
    LegendItem
    A temporary storage object for recording the properties of a legend item, without any consideration for layout issues.
    LegendItemCollection
    A collection of legend items.
    LegendRenderingOrder
    Represents the order for rendering legend items.
    PaintTypeMap
    A storage structure that maps Comparable instances with Paint instances.
    StandardChartTheme
    A default implementation of the ChartTheme interface.
    StrokeMap
    A storage structure that maps Comparable instances with Stroke instances.
